name: homework-7-chadia12
description: Create a new React Native app with Expo-CLI and use [React Navigation](https://reactnavigation.org/) to support the following app structure: * `Home` *(Bottom Tab Navigator)*     * `Services` *(Stack Navigator)*       * `Quotes`*Screen*        * `Pic of the Day` *Screen*     * `About me` *Screen*       * `Hobby` *Reusable Component*
